description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,Prawn,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Avocado,Father's Day
name: Prawn Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Place prawns into a food processor and pulse until roughly chopped. Transfer to a bowl. Add breadcrumbs, chives, rind and half the lemon juice. Season, then stir until combined. Shape mixture into 4 patties. Lightly coat with flour and place onto a plate.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add patties and cook for 3 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through.

Whisk mayonnaise and remaining lemon juice together in a bowl. Season. Spread lemon mayonnaise over roll bases, then fill with lettuce, tomato, prawn patties, avocado and extra mayonnaise. Finish with roll tops and serve with fries if desired.
